thread.title: Opening batsman Nick Gubbins signs new contract with Middlesex
thread.title_full: Opening batsman Nick Gubbins signs new contract with Middlesex

title: Opening batsman Nick Gubbins signs new contract with Middlesex
text:
Opening batsman Nick Gubbins signs new contract with Middlesex 22 Oct 2015 15:46:58 
comments 
Opening batsman Nick Gubbins has signed a new deal with Middlesex through to the end of the 2018 season. 
The 21-year-old ended the most recent campaign as the county's second-highest run-scorer in one-day cricket - a year which included his maiden hundred against Sussex. 
"I am delighted Nick has signed a new deal with Middlesex CCC. His performances in 2015 merit the extension and, but for an unfortunate injury, he would have played a near full season of county cricket. During 2015 Nick showed the ability to thrive in all forms of the game," said director of cricket Angus Fraser. 
"We believe Nick is an exciting talent and we know he has an excellent work ethic. The two qualities give him a great chance of having a long and distinguished career in cricket." Related Sport News
